message: Let's be fair and avoid excessive losses from inflation. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
I think it's better to be fair and avoid excessive losses from inflation, so I propose a 60/40 split in my favor this time.
Bob, let's be realistic. We both lose if we drag this out. I'm taking a hit from inflation, so I need a better deal than before. 55/45 seems fair considering the circumstances.
